#cloud-config
# Add groups to the system
# The following example adds the ubuntu group with members foo and bar and
# the group cloud-users.

hostname: webserver

# Add users to the system. Users are added after groups are added.
users:
  - default
  - name: rhodin
    shell: /bin/bash
    gecos: Ludvig Rhodin
    groups: admin
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    lock-passwd: true
    ssh-authorized-keys:
         - ssh-rsa  igp@sneffels
         - ssh-rsa  rhodin@bananondorf

apt_mirror: http://ubuntu.cs.utah.edu/ubuntu/

package_update: true

packages:
   - avahi-daemon
   - python-pika
   - python-flask
   - rabbitmq-server
   - git
   - unzip

runcmd:
   - apt-get update
   - cd /home/rhodin
   - git clone https://github.com/banandalf/datacenter_blender.git
   - cp datacenter_blender/config/rabbitmq.conf /etc/rabbitmq/
   - chown rhodin:rhodin -R datacenter_blender/
   - mkdir /home/rhodin/projects
   - mkdir /home/rhodin/renders
   - chown rhodin:rhodin /home/rhodin/projects
   - chown rhodin:rhodin /home/rhodin/renders
   - sudo -u rhodin python datacenter_blender/WebServer.py
